title: The Apache Indian
brief_description: Illustrates how the ancient Apache ceremonies have undergone little change through the years, still providing opportunities for tribal pageantry and displays such as horsemanship. Includes the ‘puberty’ ceremonial dance of a young girl involving the whole community.
